name: TimeTriggers
skdetail:

Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill creates a virtual doorbell device that will automatically be pressed every hour on the hour. This skill can be used to trigger other Alexa actions or skills by using an Alexa Routine.

For example, after enabling and setting up this skill you will have a new "Time Tigger" device in the Devices section of the Alexa app and you can set up a routine to open the Clock Chime skill on one of your Echo devices when that new Time Trigger device is pressed. This will cause your selected Echo device to play hourly clock chimes.

Getting Started:

1. Enable this skill in the Alexa app
2. Log in to your Amazon account and allow the skill access to your name and email address (only used for support purposes).
- Once you have enabled the skill and allowed access, you should see a new device called "Time Trigger" in the Devices section of the Alexa app. This is a doorbell device that will trigger every hour on the hour.
3. In the Routines section of Alexa app, create a routine to perform an action when Time Trigger is pressed (for example: "alexa, open clock chime").
